title: "What are the techniques and concepts covered in the Quantum Psi (c) course?"
first_phrase: This text is a summary of a 4-day course on Quantum Psi conducted in Turin, Italy. The course aims to introduce the participants to the techniques of emotional deconstruction that can be practiced alongside the dry path (Yang) already taught in the Presence course. The topics covered include the use of the crystal for clairvoyance, techniques for grief processing, time-line therapy, catarsis, manipulation to participation, enneagram, hypnomentalism, multi-dimensional communication, the concept of the base emotion, fusion/defusion method, and more. The last 200 tokens cover techniques for regressing to past lives, further examples of fascination, and a comparison between PNL and Quantum Psi.

Possono anche corrispondere all'idea di Jung dei 4 tipi.
last_phrase: In conclusion, Quantum Psi (c) provides a powerful technique for working with past lives and parts of the self, utilizing methods such as regression fascination and defusion to help individuals gain awareness and resolve issues. While PNL may be effective for initial dialogue with clients, Quantum Psi (c) offers a more profound and holistic approach to creating transformational change. Through the use of techniques such as hyperpresence, clairvoyance, and the alchemical oven, individuals can connect with their true essence and live a multilevel, conscious life.
